summary: Function takes a list of numbers (flist), a standard value, and an indicator as parameters. If any number in the list is greater than the standard value and the indicator is True, it returns False; otherwise, it returns True.

details.comment: Function takes a list of numbers (flist), a standard value, and an indicator as parameters. If any number in the list is greater than the standard value and the indicator is True, it returns False; otherwise, it returns True.
